channel.title: Banning Host to fast
channel.description: my server auto bans a host after 5 log in tries how do i raise it? heres a example [code]:: Port: :: 43594 :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_07... DeltaScape Server. Connection from Ruben-PC:53953 null Shoopdawhoopbot1: character file not found. Connection from Ruben-PC:53954 null ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Ruben-PC) Connection from Ruben-PC:53955 null ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Ruben-PC) Connection from Ruben-PC:53956 null ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Ruben-PC) Connection from Ruben-PC:53957 null ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Ruben-PC) BANNING HOST Ruben-PC (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected Ruben-PC:53958 ClientHandler: Rejected Ruben-PC:53959 ClientHandler: Rejected Ruben-PC:53960 ClientHandler: Rejected Ruben-PC:53963 ClientHandler: Rejected Ruben-PC:53966 ClientHandler: Rejected Ruben-PC:53969 Game saved for player Shoopdawhoopbot1 ClientHandler: Client Shoopdawhoopbot1 disconnected (Ruben-PC)[/code] yes i syi'd my own server just to show this

item.title: Banning Host to fast
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

it should be around here

[code] public int[] ips = new int[1000];

public long[] lastConnect = new long[1000];

public server() {
	// the current way of controlling the server at runtime and a great
	// debugging/testing tool
	// jserv js = new jserv(this);
	// js.start();

}

public void banHost(String host, int num) {
	if (false) {
		banned.add(host);
	} else {
		try {
			misc.println("BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)");
			banned.add(host);
			delay = 2000;
			delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

}

public boolean checkHost(String host) {
	for (String h : banned) {
		if (h.equals(host))
			return false;
	}
	int num = 0;
	for (String h : connections) {
		if (host.equals(h)) {
			num++;
		}
	}
	if (num > 5) {
		banHost(host, num);
		return false;
	}

	if (checkLog("ipbans", host)) {
		System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!");
		return false; // ip ban added by bakatool
	}
	return true;
}

public boolean checkLog(String file, String playerName) {
	// check ipbans -bakatool
	try {
		BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("config//"
				+ file + ".txt"));
		String data = null;
		while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) {
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
	} catch (IOException e) {
		System.out.println("Critical error while checking for data!");
		System.out.println(file + ":" + playerName);
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	return false;
}

public int getConnections(String host) {
	int count = 0;
	for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
		if ((p != null) && !p.disconnected
				&& p.connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(host)) {
			count++;
		}
	}
	return count;
}[/code]

Read full topic
